actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Inter-American Foundation for fiscal years 1982 and 1983.

summary.text: Inter-American Foundation Act of 1981 - Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1969 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Inter-American Foundation. Changes the method for reimbursing travel expenses of the Foundation's Board members (currently such reimbursement is limited to $50 per day plus transportation expenses).

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for the Inter-American Foundation for fiscal years 1982 and 1983.
